issues.proposed_solution: Remove the redundant 'parent: artificial intelligence' attribute since 'relationship: branch of artificial intelligence' already conveys the same information. The is_a edge (ID: b313f690-5101-49af-b930-422e10377316) also establishes this relationship explicitly.
Add a direct 'related_to' edge from 'Knowledge Graph Construction' to 'Artificial Intelligence' since Knowledge Graph Construction is in the AI domain (as indicated by its attributes).
